parameters.name: Head Shape
parameters.description: Overall cranial structure that forms the foundation of facial appearance

options.name: Oval
options.visual: Slightly elongated curved form with balanced proportions.
options.as_seen_in: Classical artistic representations, considered universally balanced.

options.name: Round
options.visual: Circular shape with equal width and height, softer angles.
options.as_seen_in: Certain East Asian populations, youthful appearances.

options.name: Square
options.visual: Angular with similar width at forehead and jaw, strong lines.
options.as_seen_in: Classic masculine ideal, strong-featured individuals.

options.name: Rectangular
options.visual: Elongated square shape with vertical emphasis.
options.as_seen_in: Certain European populations, longer facial structures.

options.name: Heart
options.visual: Wider at forehead tapering to a narrower chin point.
options.as_seen_in: Classic feminine ideal, certain youthful faces.

options.name: Diamond
options.visual: Narrow forehead widening at cheekbones then tapering to chin.
options.as_seen_in: Fashion models, distinctive angular appearances.

options.name: Triangle
options.visual: Narrow forehead widening significantly at jawline.
options.as_seen_in: Certain body types, faces with prominent lower features.

options.name: Inverted-Triangle
options.visual: Wide forehead narrowing significantly toward chin.
options.as_seen_in: Certain athletic builds, faces with prominent upper features.

options.name: Long
options.visual: Vertically extended with narrow proportions throughout.
options.as_seen_in: Certain European and African populations.

options.name: Baseball
options.visual: Shortened oval with slight angularity at sides.
options.as_seen_in: Certain East Asian and Native American populations.

alignment.name: None (default)
alignment.visual: Standard alignment of the head shape.
alignment.as_seen_in: Typical expression of the selected shape.

alignment.name: Slightly
alignment.visual: Mild expression of the head shape characteristics.

alignment.name: Classically
alignment.visual: Archetypal expression of the head shape characteristics.

alignment.name: Perfectly
alignment.visual: Ideal expression of the head shape characteristics.

definition.name: None (default)
definition.visual: Standard definition of head shape contours.

definition.name: Softly
definition.visual: Gentle transitions between head shape contours.

definition.name: Moderately
definition.visual: Clear but not pronounced head shape contours.

definition.name: Sharply
definition.visual: Distinct and pronounced head shape contours.

prominence.name: None (default)
prominence.visual: Standard prominence of head shape characteristics.

prominence.name: Subtle
prominence.visual: Minimal expression of distinctive head shape features.

prominence.name: Pronounced
prominence.visual: Strong expression of distinctive head shape features.

parameters.name: Face Shape
parameters.description: Distinctive facial contour that defines overall appearance

options.name: Oval
options.visual: Slightly elongated curved form with balanced proportions.
options.as_seen_in: Considered universally flattering, many fashion models.

options.name: Round
options.visual: Full cheeks with soft angles and similar width/height.
options.as_seen_in: Youthful appearances, certain East Asian populations.

options.name: Square
options.visual: Strong jawline creating angular corners at similar width to forehead.
options.as_seen_in: Strong-featured individuals, certain masculine ideals.

options.name: Rectangular
options.visual: Elongated with angular jaw and similar width at forehead/jawline.
options.as_seen_in: Longer facial structures, certain European populations.

options.name: Heart
options.visual: Wide forehead and cheekbones tapering to a pointed chin.
options.as_seen_in: Classic feminine ideal, faces with prominent cheekbones.

options.name: Diamond
options.visual: Narrow forehead and jawline with prominent cheekbones.
options.as_seen_in: High-fashion models, distinctive angular appearances.

options.name: Triangle
options.visual: Narrow forehead with wide jawline creating bottom-heavy appearance.
options.as_seen_in: Faces with prominent jaw structures.

options.name: Inverted-Triangle
options.visual: Wide forehead tapering significantly to narrow chin.
options.as_seen_in: Faces with prominent upper features.

options.name: Long
options.visual: Vertically extended with narrow proportions throughout.
options.as_seen_in: Certain European and African populations.

options.name: Baseball
options.visual: Shortened oval with slight angularity at sides.
options.as_seen_in: Certain East Asian and Native American populations.

alignment.name: None (default)
alignment.visual: Standard alignment of the face shape.
alignment.as_seen_in: Typical expression of the selected shape.

alignment.name: Slightly
alignment.visual: Mild expression of the face shape characteristics.

alignment.name: Classically
alignment.visual: Archetypal expression of the face shape characteristics.

alignment.name: Perfectly
alignment.visual: Ideal expression of the face shape characteristics.

definition.name: None (default)
definition.visual: Standard definition of face shape contours.

definition.name: Softly
definition.visual: Gentle transitions between face shape contours.

definition.name: Moderately
definition.visual: Clear but not pronounced face shape contours.

definition.name: Sharply
definition.visual: Distinct and pronounced face shape contours.

prominence.name: None (default)
prominence.visual: Standard prominence of face shape characteristics.

prominence.name: Subtle
prominence.visual: Minimal expression of distinctive face shape features.

prominence.name: Pronounced
prominence.visual: Strong expression of distinctive face shape features.

parameters.name: Forehead
parameters.description: Upper facial feature that frames the face and influences overall proportions

options.name: Smooth High
options.visual: Vertically extended with even surface and minimal texture.
options.as_seen_in: Classical feminine beauty, balanced facial proportions.

options.name: Gentle Rounded
options.visual: Soft curved surface with harmonious transitions.
options.as_seen_in: Youthful feminine appearances, softer facial features.

options.name: Delicate Flat
options.visual: Minimal protrusion with refined even surface.
options.as_seen_in: Certain East Asian feminine features, elegant proportions.

options.name: Feminine Slope
options.visual: Subtle backward incline from brow to hairline.
options.as_seen_in: Classical female profiles, graceful facial angles.

options.name: Vertical Balanced
options.visual: Perpendicular angle to facial plane with smooth texture.
options.as_seen_in: Symmetrical feminine features, modern beauty standards.

options.name: Pronounced High-and-Wide
options.visual: Vertically extended with significant horizontal span.
options.as_seen_in: Classical masculine representations, strong features.

options.name: Rugged Receding
options.visual: Noticeable backward slope from brow line toward hairline.
options.as_seen_in: Mature masculine features, distinctive male profiles.

options.name: Bossed Prominent
options.visual: Forward projection with distinct prominence above brows.
options.as_seen_in: Strong-featured males, powerful masculine appearances.

options.name: Strong Flat
options.visual: Minimal slope with substantial surface area.
options.as_seen_in: Certain masculine ethnic features, balanced strong features.

options.name: Brow-Heavy
options.visual: Developed ridge above eyes creating shadow effect.
options.as_seen_in: Traditional masculine features, powerful expressions.

options.name: Angled Structural
options.visual: Distinct planes creating architectural appearance.
options.as_seen_in: Defined male features, sculptural facial structures.

height.name: Low
height.visual: Reduced vertical space between brows and hairline.

height.name: Medium
height.visual: Moderate vertical space between brows and hairline.

height.name: High
height.visual: Extended vertical space between brows and hairline.

parameters.name: Jawline
parameters.description: Lower facial structure that defines face shape and contributes to overall character

options.name: Soft Oval
options.visual: Gently curved with smooth transitions and minimal angles.
options.as_seen_in: Classical feminine features, balanced facial structures.

options.name: Delicate Round
options.visual: Soft curves without distinct angles, subtle definition.
options.as_seen_in: Youthful feminine appearances, softer facial features.

options.name: Tapered Heart
options.visual: Rounded with a gentle point at the chin.
options.as_seen_in: Traditional feminine beauty standards, certain models.

options.name: Subtle Defined
options.visual: Noticeable but not prominent jawline with soft angles.
options.as_seen_in: Athletic female features, fashion models.

options.name: Graceful Wide
options.visual: Broader jawline maintaining feminine softness.
options.as_seen_in: Strong-featured women, certain ethnic characteristics.

options.name: Elegant Pointed
options.visual: Refined tapering to a noticeable chin point.
options.as_seen_in: High fashion models, distinctive feminine profiles.

options.name: Strong Square
options.visual: Pronounced angular lines with defined corners.
options.as_seen_in: Classic masculine jawlines, action figures.

options.name: Bold Mandibular
options.visual: Prominent horizontal emphasis with distinct angle.
options.as_seen_in: Masculine ideals, strong facial structures.

options.name: Chiseled Defined
options.visual: Sharp delineation with noticeable angularity.
options.as_seen_in: Athletic male features, defined masculine profiles.

options.name: Broad Wide
options.visual: Extended lateral spread creating prominent lower face.
options.as_seen_in: Strong masculine features, powerful appearances.

options.name: Rugged Round
options.visual: Fuller jawline with moderate definition.
options.as_seen_in: Natural masculine features, less angular profiles.

options.name: Subtle Receding
options.visual: Less pronounced jawline with gradual transition to neck.
options.as_seen_in: Certain male facial structures, intellectual appearances.

definition.name: Moderately defined
definition.visual: Clear but not pronounced jawline contours.

prominence.name: Subtle
prominence.visual: Minimal projection of jawline from neck.

prominence.name: Pronounced
prominence.visual: Significant projection of jawline from neck.

parameters.name: Cheekbones
parameters.description: Facial bone structure that influences facial width and light dynamics

options.name: High-and-Prominent
options.visual: Elevated position with noticeable projection.
options.as_seen_in: Fashion models, distinctive feminine features.

options.name: Softly-Rounded
options.visual: Gentle curves with smooth transitions and subtle definition.
options.as_seen_in: Youthful appearances, classical feminine faces.

options.name: Delicate-Features
options.visual: Refined structure with elegant contours.
options.as_seen_in: Feminine beauty standards, subtle facial structures.

options.name: Balanced-Asymmetry
options.visual: Naturally varied prominence between sides creating character.
options.as_seen_in: Unique feminine faces, natural beauty standards.

options.name: Dramatic-Contour
options.visual: Strongly defined with notable light-catching properties.
options.as_seen_in: Editorial models, striking feminine features.

options.name: Natural-Flow
options.visual: Harmoniously integrated with other facial features.
options.as_seen_in: Balanced feminine faces, approachable appearances.

options.name: Angular-Definition
options.visual: Distinct planes with structural emphasis.
options.as_seen_in: Masculine facial structures, defined features.

options.name: Wide-and-Strong
options.visual: Broad structure creating facial width.
options.as_seen_in: Powerful masculine appearances, strong features.

options.name: Sculpted-Look
options.visual: Clearly defined with dramatic shadows.
options.as_seen_in: Chiseled masculine features, heroic imagery.

options.name: Flat-Profile
options.visual: Minimal projection with subtle definition.
options.as_seen_in: Certain ethnic features, understated appearances.

options.name: Weathered-Character
options.visual: Distinctive definition with maturity markers.
options.as_seen_in: Experienced faces, character actors.

options.name: Pronounced-Structure
options.visual: Highly visible bone structure influencing overall appearance.
options.as_seen_in: Strong masculine features, distinctive profiles.
